block.better_cc.computer.desc: Runs software from Flash Memory and Hard Disks.
block.better_cc.network_connector.desc: Transmits network packets via Network Cables.
block.better_cc.network_hub.desc: Distributes network packets among all attached Network Connectors.
block.better_cc.charger.desc: Charges entities and items in containers on top of it.
block.better_cc.creative_energy.desc: Provides unlimited energy to adjacent blocks. Intended for testing.
block.better_cc.projector.desc: Projects images onto surfaces in front of it.
block.better_cc.keyboard.desc: Allows keyboard input when using a projector.
item.better_cc.wrench.desc: Configures devices and dismantles them (while sneaking).
item.better_cc.manual.desc: Holds information on all things needed when working with Computers.
item.better_cc.memory.desc: Random Access Memory (RAM) used in Computers and Robots.
item.better_cc.hard_drive.desc: Mass storage for operating systems and data.
item.better_cc.floppy.desc: Portable storage used to transfer data between Computers.
item.better_cc.redstone_interface_card.d: Emits and reads redstone signals through the Computer.
item.better_cc.network_interface_card.de: Sends and receives network packets via attached Network Connectors.
item.better_cc.network_tunnel_card.desc: Sends and receives network packets to a linked device.
item.better_cc.file_import_export_card.d: Imports and exports files from and into your real file system.
item.better_cc.robot.desc: A mobile Computer. Use a Wrench to pick it back up.
item.better_cc.inventory_operations_modu: Moves items in, into and out of the Robot's inventory.
item.better_cc.sound_card.desc: Plays various sounds from its highly realistic sound bank.
item.better_cc.network_tunnel_module.des: Sends and receives network packets to a linked device.
gui.better_cc.computer.capture_input.des: When enabled, as long as the mouse cursor is hovering the terminal contents, all input will be captured, including the escape key.
gui.better_cc.computer.power.desc: Toggles the power state of the computer.
gui.better_cc.network_interface_card.inf: Drag to rotate. Click faces to toggle connectivity.
message.better_cc.connector.error.too_fa: Distance between connectors is too large.
message.better_cc.connector.error.obstru: No clear line of sight between connectors.
message.better_cc.invalid_facade_block: This block cannot be used as a facade.
tooltip.better_cc.flash_memory_missing: A flash memory containing a firmware is required to boot.
tooltip.better_cc.memory_missing: Some memory is required to load the flash memory for execution to boot.
tooltip.better_cc.hard_drive_missing: Most systems will require a root file system to boot.
